__e: If my memory serves me correctly, didn't you used to have a red treasure chest?
Once I was a very interesting young fellow made-to-order for you.
And this is the earth, ten years later, a fragment of what was once a whole, a remnant of what was once a race.
I was inferior to both of you in the past
You know, I used to figure you had a handle for everything. You knew it all.
I actually was a real cop once so I know how you assholes think, which is to say, slowly.
A year in this environment can break what was once a family and destroy it.
Your house was once a gambling place?
I had a family once... a wife and two daughters.
* Once upon a time * * In olden days *
Years ago, there were flowers everywhere but no more.
Whatever he once was, he no longer has the same ability or strength.
I know. When you were young, people were better.
Back then, man and trees were friends.
In the old days things were a lot simpler.
You didn't used to be afraid of the phone.
I always think that he was once somebody's baby boy.
We saw this couple, Dani and Léaud, in Day for Night.
